verbose_text: In our previous study, it was shown that the knockdown of VEGFR2 in human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVECs) decreased the expression of adhesion molecules and consequently reduced monocyte adhesion in regions of non uniform shear stress.
evidence: VEGFR2 in human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVECs) decreased the expression of adhesion
